data.eml:eml: Updated checklist of Iranian Opiinae (Hymenoptera: Braconidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gadallah, Neveen S., Ghahari, Hassan, Peris-Felipo, Francisco Javier, Fischer, Maximilian (2016): Updated checklist of Iranian Opiinae (Hymenoptera: Braconidae). Zootaxa 4066 (1): 1-40, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4066.1.1
